title: White House Faces Calls to Stop Ex-Guantánamo Detainee’s Forced Return to Russia
description:
The family of a former Guantánamo Bay detainee wants to stop the UAE from forcibly repatriating him to Russia in violation of international law.

The post White House Faces Calls to Stop Ex-Guantánamo Detainee’s Forced Return to Russia appeared first on The Intercept.
